title: Keep admin delete page password-gated without adding new auth prompts

requirements.summary: Ensure /admin/delete-chatrooms remains gated by the existing sessionStorage password prompt and keep the rest of the app free of new auth/role prompts.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to the admin delete chatrooms page shows the password prompt when not authenticated in sessionStorage, and only shows management UI after successful password entry.
Creating chatrooms, viewing chatrooms, sending messages, reactions, and other regular interactions do not require login or role checks in the UI.
All user-facing text remains in English.

file_operations.description: Preserve and harden the existing password-prompt gating (sessionStorage-based) so the admin management UI only renders after successful password entry, and ensure all user-facing copy remains English.
Audit and adjust user-facing error handling for non-admin actions to avoid introducing any new login/role/permission prompts in the UI (keep messages generic and English).
Confirm the /admin/delete-chatrooms route remains wired to the existing AdminDeleteChatroomsPage password-gated flow and that no additional auth guard screens are introduced for non-admin routes.
